name: bedrock-integration-examples
description: AWS Bedrock integration examples - Converse API, Inline Agents, Bedrock Agents, and AgentCore Runtime patterns
author: blueleader07

scripts.install:all: cd examples/converse-api && npm install && cd ../inline-agents && npm install && cd ../bedrock-agents && npm install && cd ../agent-core && npm install && cd ../../shared && npm install
scripts.build:all: cd examples/converse-api && npm run build && cd ../inline-agents && npm run build && cd ../bedrock-agents && npm run build && cd ../agent-core && npm run build
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:converse && npm run deploy:inline && npm run deploy:bedrock && npm run deploy:agentcore
